content.rendered: Meenakshi has a PGDBM from an AICTE approved college of Lucknow, India. She has work experience of over 10 years. Her core competencies are team work, flexibility, adaptability, communication and problem solving skills. After working in various organisations at different levels she got attracted to the education sector. She has currently been working in the education sector for the last 4 years and helping and guiding students in their admissions, career decisions, stream choices etc.
